MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 09-NOV-2020 14:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the LL65 postcode area of Holyhead, affecting properties in Tre Efan Estate and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 3:36AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of reports of grounded overhead cables and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2PM. If this information changes then we will make every effort to contact you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:50AM on 09 November 2020
